summary: Kermit and his friends spend Christmas staging a surprise visit to Fozzie Bear's mother's farm.
cast: Frank Oz|Dave Goelz|Richard Hunt|Kathryn Mullen|Jerry Nelson|Karen Prell|Steve Whitmire|David Rudman|Jim Henson|Caroll Spinney|Gerard Parkes|Terry Angus|Kevin Clash|Debra Spinney|Fred Stinson
title: A Muppet Family Christmas
